abstract: The sentencing was the latest chapter in the government’s sweeping crackdown on insider trading, which centered on Raj Rajaratnam, head of the Galleon Group
snippet: The sentencing was the latest chapter in the government’s sweeping crackdown on insider trading, which centered on Raj Rajaratnam, head of the Galleon Group

headline.main: Chiesi Sentenced to 30 Months in Galleon Case
